description: Here you can see all projects and a little description

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: This is my portfolio, where I show my projects and skills.

badui.title: Bad UI
badui.description: I created a website in 2 weeks using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, designed to make user interaction intentionally challenging and explore vanilla JavaScript creatively.

doGether.title: Do Gether
doGether.description: Do Gether is a social media platform designed to connect like-minded individuals with shared interests. The core idea is to bring people together to engage in shared activities.

fantasyQuest.title: Fantasy Quest
fantasyQuest.description: The idea behind the app was to create a combination of Pokémon Go, the original Pokémon games, and Final Fantasy 1.

pma.title: PMA
pma.description: A project management application for you to manage your projects.
